001package ltd.icecold.orangeengine.api.model;
002
003import com.google.common.collect.Lists;
004import com.google.common.collect.Maps;
005import ltd.icecold.orangeengine.api.model.data.bone.ExtraBoneData;
006import ltd.icecold.orangeengine.api.model.data.model.ModelData;
007import org.bukkit.entity.Entity;
008import org.bukkit.entity.EntityType;
009
010import java.util.List;
011import java.util.Map;
012import java.util.UUID;
013
014/**
015 * Managing entity models.
016 * <p>
017 * Model operation process.
018 * <ul> {@link ModelManager#addNewModelEntity(UUID, String)} binding models for Entity.</ul>
019 * <ul> Get {@link ModelEntity} and you can change models
020 * , play animations, dynamically adjust bones, etc. for this entity.</ul>
021 */
022public interface ModelManager {
023
024    /**
025     * Get ModelEntity by existing model entity UUID.
026     * @param uuid Entity UUID
027     * @return ModelEntity
028     */
029    ModelEntity getModelEntity(UUID uuid);
030
031    /**
032     * Get model data by model name, note that modifying ModelData.
033     * directly does not modify client-side rendering.
034     * @param model Model Name
035     * @return Model name
036     */
037    ModelData getModelDataByName(String model);
038
039    /**
040     * Get all ModelEntity for the given model name.
041     * @param modelName Model name
042     * @return All ModelEntity for the given model name
043     */
044    List<ModelEntity> getAllEntityByModel(String modelName);
045
046    /**
047     * Binding a model to an entity.
048     * <p>
049     * The model will not be rendered if it is not registered in the client resource package.
050     * <p>
051     * <strong>This method is not recommended, we recommend using {@link ModelManager#addNewModelEntity(UUID, String)}</strong>
052     * @param entity Entity UUID
053     * @param model Model data
054     * @return ModelEntity
055     * @see ModelManager#addNewModelEntity(UUID, String)
056     */
057    ModelEntity addNewModelEntity(UUID entity, ModelData model);
058
059    /**
060     * Binding a model to an entity.
061     * <p>
062     * The model will not be rendered if it is
063     * not registered in the client resource package.
064     * <p>
065     * <strong>
066     * This method is not recommended,
067     * we recommend using {@link ModelManager#addNewModelEntity(UUID, String)}.
068     * </strong>
069     * @param entity Entity UUID
070     * @param model Model name
071     * @return ModelEntity
072     */
073    ModelEntity addNewModelEntity(UUID entity,String model);
074
075    /**
076     * Remove entity bound models.
077     * @param uuid Entity UUID
078     * @param client Whether to send a command to the client, if TRUE then the client will
079     *              remove the entity model rendering to restore the original entity type model,
080     *              FALSE then the client will not remove the current model rendering only its data on the server.
081     */
082    void removeModelEntity(UUID uuid,boolean client);
083
084    /**
085     * Modify model bone rendering state, modify bone display state.
086     * <p>
087     * <strong>Added for ModelEngine tag compatibility. Not recommended for developers!</strong>
088     * <p>
089     * Recommend using {@link ModelEntity#addBoneExtraData(String, ExtraBoneData)} to modify the bones.
090     * @param entity Entity UUID
091     * @param modelId Model name
092     * @param modelPart Old bone name
093     * @param newModel New model name (if same as modelId, do not modify model only bones)
094     * @param newModelPart New bone name
095     * @return Is successfully modified
096     * @see ModelEntity#addBoneExtraData(String, ExtraBoneData)
097     */
098    boolean changeModelPart(Entity entity,String modelId,String modelPart,String newModel,String newModelPart);
099
100    /**
101     * Get all ModelEntity with entity UUID.
102     * @return All ModelEntity
103     */
104    Map<UUID, ModelEntity> getModelEntityMap();
105}
